rules: Use Fraunces ONLY for the Brand Name and major Landing Page headings.
Use Manrope for all Dashboard UI, Tables, and Forms.
Use 'Stone' grays (warm) instead of 'Slate' (cool) for borders and text.
Primary buttons must be Deep Blue.
Success states (New Sale) must be Fresh Green.
Use 'shadow-sm' for cards, never large drop shadows unless hovering.
Tables must be 'compact' but with generous padding on rows (py-3).

buttons.primary: h-10 px-6 rounded-lg bg-blue-900 text-white hover:bg-blue-800 transition-all shadow-sm font-medium
buttons.secondary: h-10 px-6 rounded-lg bg-white border border-stone-200 text-stone-700 hover:bg-stone-50 transition-all font-medium

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-stone-200 shadow-sm overflow-hidden

inputs.base: h-10 rounded-lg border-stone-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-900/20 focus:border-blue-900 bg-white

tables.header: bg-stone-50 text-stone-500 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the sidebar background if possible.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80' for sticky headers only.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list entry (staggered).

hero_background.desc: Lush green field with cows, perfect for Login/Landing hero background.

product_milk.desc: Glass of milk on white table, clean product shot.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/fraunces' and '@fontsource/manrope' to package.json immediately.
2. THEME SETUP: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to use the 'Stone' color palette for neutrals and 'Blue-900' for primary.
3. LAYOUT: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component that uses a fixed sidebar and scrollable main content area.
4. COMPONENTS: Heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'slate' look. Use 'rounded-xl' everywhere.
5. TABLES: This is a data-heavy app. Ensure tables are readable. Use alternating row colors (zebra striping) very subtly (bg-stone-50/30).
6. MOBILE: Ensure the 'Daily Sales' page is optimized for mobile touch (large tap targets).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
